title: 命令的属性 加攻击距离的武器

replies.author: Abraham511
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Abraham511 于 2018-11-7 22:24 编辑 

reachDistance就是增加操作距离
所以可以做各种RPG/OOC武器
比如生成一个叫8888米大刀:
/give @p minecraft:stick 1 0 {display:{Name:"8888米大刀"},Unbreakable:1b,AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.reachDistance",Name:"noName",Amount:100d,Operation:0,UUIDMost:5227005646895486L,UUIDLeast:5227005646895486L,Slot:mainhand},{AttributeName:"generic.attackDamage",Name:"noName",Amount:10d,Operation:0,UUIDMost:8987941689016318L,UUIDLeast:8987941689016318L}]}复制代码
诸如此类

replies.author: ruhuasiyu
replies.txt_content: 后来的观众请注意，截止到1.14为止，原版并无reachDistance属性。
